set_notification_message.text:
Scripts/System

F - (F)unction keys
B - (B)uiltin media keys
M - Toggle (M)enu bar
P - (P)lay or pause

to.shell_command: '/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'Caps -> Hyper (Fn keys are mac builtins)' && open -g 'raycast://extensions/maxnyby/raycast-notification/index?launchType=background&arguments=%7B%22title%22%3A%22Media%20keys%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22success%22%7D'
